scripts.cr: [ -d dest/resources ] && rm -r dest/resources; cp -R resources dest/resources
scripts.crw: [ ! -d dest ] && mkdir -p dest; find windll -type f -exec bash -c 'if [ ! -e "dest/$(basename "{}")" ]; then cp "{}" dest/; fi' \;
scripts.bw: bun cr && bun crw && bun buildcw && sleep 0 && bun dev
scripts.bwm: bun cr && bun crw && bun buildc && sleep 0 && bun dev
scripts.b: bun cr && bun buildc && sleep 0 && bun dev
